title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 510.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 510.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to create the Queens Flood

Damage Assistance Program (program) and establish an application and program
procedures in accordance with section 25 of chapter 17 of the Laws of 1999 for
the award of grants in Queens County by the State Emergency Management Office
(SEMO) to small businesses and residents affected by a severe rainstorm on or
about January 3, 1999. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
510.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
